DocAttribute.Name: IsPotable
DocAttribute.Documentation: If TRUE, then the water is considered potable.

DocAttribute.Name: Hardness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Water hardness as positive, multivalent ion concentration in the water (usually concentrations of calcium and magnesium ions in terms of calcium carbonate).

DocAttribute.Name: AlkalinityConcentration
DocAttribute.Documentation: Maximum alkalinity concentration (maximum sum of concentrations of each of the negative ions substances measured as CaCO~3~).

DocAttribute.Name: AcidityConcentration
DocAttribute.Documentation: Maximum CaCO~3~ equivalent that would neutralize the acid.

DocAttribute.Name: ImpuritiesContent
DocAttribute.Documentation: Fraction of impurities such as dust to the total amount of water. This is measured in weight of impurities per weight of water and is therefore unitless.

DocAttribute.Name: PHLevel
DocAttribute.Documentation: Maximum water ph in a range from 0-14.

DocAttribute.Name: DissolvedSolidsContent
DocAttribute.Documentation: Fraction of the dissolved solids to the total amount of water. This is measured in weight of dissolved solids per weight of water and is therefore unitless.
